decisionPatterns.routing: Choose App Router for new projects, Pages Router for legacy
decisionPatterns.rendering: SSR for dynamic content, SSG for static, ISR for mixed
decisionPatterns.styling: Tailwind CSS for modern development, CSS Modules for component isolation
decisionPatterns.state: Zustand for simple state, Redux Toolkit for complex state
decisionPatterns.api: Next.js API routes for backend, tRPC for type-safe APIs

optimizations: Implement dynamic imports for code splitting
Use Next.js Image component for automatic optimization
Configure ISR for frequently updated content
Implement proper error boundaries
Use React.memo for component optimization
securityPatterns: Implement CSRF protection on API routes
Use environment variables for sensitive data
Implement rate limiting on API endpoints
performancePatterns: Use streaming SSR for better perceived performance
Optimize font loading with Next.js font optimization
Implement proper meta tags for SEO

decisionPatterns.installation: Use Composer for Drupal 11 with proper dependency management
decisionPatterns.theming: Olivero for base theme, custom themes for complex designs
decisionPatterns.modules: Use core modules when possible, contrib modules for specialized features
decisionPatterns.deployment: Drush for automation, configuration management for environments
decisionPatterns.api: JSON:API for headless, GraphQL for complex data requirements

Use BigPipe for improved perceived performance
Configure Varnish for page caching
Optimize database queries with proper indexing
Use image styles and optimization
securityPatterns: Implement proper user permissions and roles
Use security updates and patch management

decisionPatterns.repository: Use monorepo for related projects, micro-repos for independent services
decisionPatterns.branching: GitFlow for complex projects, GitHub Flow for simple projects
decisionPatterns.ci_cd: GitHub Actions for CI/CD, self-hosted runners for sensitive operations
decisionPatterns.collaboration: Use pull requests for code review, protected branches for critical paths
decisionPatterns.deployment: GitHub Pages for static sites, GitHub Actions for dynamic deployments

Implement proper dependency caching
Use matrix builds for parallel testing
Optimize Docker images for faster deployment
Use GitHub Advanced Security for code scanning
performancePatterns: Optimize repository size with Git LFS
Use GitHub Projects for project management
Monitor API usage and rate limits

decisionPatterns.cdn: Use Cloudflare CDN for all static assets
decisionPatterns.security: Implement WAF for protection, DDoS mitigation for availability
decisionPatterns.performance: Use Argo Smart Routing for optimization
decisionPatterns.deployment: Cloudflare Pages for static sites, Workers for serverless
decisionPatterns.dns: Cloudflare DNS for management, email routing for forwarding
